value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Get ready, everyone—summer is just
getting started!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Commander Anna! I'm happy to see
the skip back in your step!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Of course! It is summer, after all. We
shouldn't let any precious summer
moments go to waste!$k$pFor example...I've decided to start
selling these special summertime
swimsuits!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow—what a great idea! That's the
Commander Anna we know and
love!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm... I suppose this is preferable to
her collapsing from the strain of NOT
selling swimsuits...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Swim19,Face|That merchant back there...what spell
did she cast to get us to buy outfits
like these?! We've been duped!$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィオーラ,ch03_24_Fiora_F_Swim19,Face|If my subordinates saw me wearing
something like this, I can't imagine
what gossip it would inspire...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Swim19,Face|She did say there are certain "Laws of
the Tropics," just like there are Laws
of Sacae, so perhaps this is...normal?$k$pBy wearing swimsuits like these, we
are showing respect for the regional
customs... Right?$k$pShe DID say there are laws, didn't
she? I didn't imagine it?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Swim19,Face|It's possible. Just look at the people
on the beach. They are dressed in a
similar fashion...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Swim19,Face|True... But do you think they paid as
much as we did?! We were charged a
premium for how little fabric we got...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Swim19,Face|No time to worry about that! A battle
is fast approaching... As the contract
demands, we must engage.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Swim19,Face|Wait—what? Fight? In THIS?! Have
you lost your mind?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Swim19,Face|I am simply carrying out my task as
it is presented to me. Nothing more,
nothing less.$k$pIf I must wear an outfit like this in
order to see my mission through to
its end, so be it.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Swim19,Face|Ugh... Fall back! We have to retreat
for now!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Swim19,Face|Yes. Our enemy has a numbers
advantage, so I agree. Retreat is
our best option right now.$k$p$Sbs150|
